betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe package crafters for each extended crafting table are placed around an unpackager, and they work like molecular assemblers for extended recipes.

You can place multiple package crafters around an unpackager (up to six) to parallelize recipes and faster processing.

Since each packager/unpckager pair holds up to 20 recipes, you can have setups that handle 20 recipes for each table.
